recipe.title: Macaroons
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 160C and line two baking trays with baking paper.
In a mixer beat egg whites, sugar and vanilla essence until foamy and sugar dissolved. Fold in coconut and make sure all the coconut is moistened.
Scoop out 1 TBSP of mixture onto trays, evenly spread out, until all used up. Bake in oven for 20 minutes or until golden.
Cool completely on trays and store in airtight container.
